mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.changdi_order_uuid_number as changdiOrderUuidNumber ,a.changdi_id as changdiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.changdi_order_true_price as changdiOrderTruePrice ,a.changdi_order_types as changdiOrderTypes ,a.shijianduan as shijianduan ,a.buy_time as buyTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
